name: FishTheFish
description:
Fish The Fish Fish the fish! Cook the fish! Sell the fish! And then... do it again ! Challenge your friends to see who's gonna last the longest! Description

Fish The Fish is a one button Warioware-like playable on Window and Android.

Play the three minigames in a row and loop on them while the difficulty increases.

CREATORS :
  • Programmer: Lancelot MARECHAL
  • Designer: Noé Pinatel
  • Sound Designer: Théo Mermet-Bouvier
  • Game Artists: 
    • Thibault Cavaroc 
    • Quentin Eung
    • Eliott Collier
    • Eliott Conoir
    • Romain Mottier
Made with Unity
